data.name: firstContact1
data.value: I, $AI0, Ruler of $CIVNAME1, wonder of the world, greet you.

data.name: firstContact2
data.value: Greetings. I, $AI0, greet you.

data.name: firstContact3
data.value: I am $AI0, of the wise and benevolent $CIVADJ3.

data.name: firstContact4
data.value: $CIVNAME1 the great and its superior people greet you. I, $AI0, desire peace with all my neighbors - even your puny culture.

data.name: firstContact5
data.value: Greetings! I am $AI0 and I speak for the clever $CIVADJ2 folk.

data.name: firstContact6
data.value: Greetings! I am $AI0 of the $CIVADJ3.

data.name: firstContact7
data.value: $AI0 of the glorious $CIVADJ2 civilization greets you. He is vaguely aware of your struggling people and will grant them peace

data.name: firstContact8
data.value: I'm $AI0 of the $CIVADJ3.

data.name: firstContact9
data.value: $AI0 greets you magnificent one. The $CIVADJ2 people love peace, but are skilled in the arts of war.

data.name: firstContact10
data.value: I, $AI0, of $CIVNAME1 seek friendship.

data.name: firstContact11
data.value: I am $AI0, and I greet you. We seek peace with all peoples, but brotherhood with few.

data.name: firstContact12
data.value: Behold! I am $AI0 of the $CIVADJ3, mortals tremble before me.

data.name: firstContact13
data.value: $AI0 of the $CIVADJ3 has noticed your cute civilization.

data.name: firstContact14
data.value: $AI0, of the Great $CIVADJ3, will refrain from scouring the world of your filth.

data.name: firstContact15
data.value: I am Great $AI0. The $CIVADJ2 people are honorable. Deal with us fairly and we shall have peace.

data.name: firstContact16
data.value: I am $AI0, of the $CIVADJ3.

data.name: proposalResponse1
data.value: Let us hear your idea...

data.name: proposalResponse2
data.value: What do you suggest?

data.name: proposalResponse3
data.value: I'm listening...

data.name: proposalResponse4
data.value: Go ahead: I'm listening.

data.name: proposalResponse5
data.value: What do you have in mind, great $PLAYER0?

data.name: proposalResponse6
data.value: We're always looking for a fair exchange, $PLAYER0. Go ahead.

data.name: proposalResponse7
data.value: What do you suggest, generous $PLAYER0?

data.name: proposalResponse8
data.value: Go ahead: shoot.

data.name: proposalResponse9
data.value: Let's hear what you're offering.

data.name: proposalResponse10
data.value: $CIVNAME1's generosity is famous the world over. Let me hear the offer.

data.name: proposalResponse11
data.value: What would the generous $CIVADJ2 people suggest?

data.name: proposalResponse12
data.value: I'm quite eager to come to an agreement with you. What is your offer?

data.name: proposalResponse13
data.value: What do you have to offer?

data.name: proposalResponse14
data.value: Let us hear your offer.

data.name: proposalResponse15
data.value: Well, what would you suggest?

data.name: proposalResponse16
data.value: I'm listening...

data.name: proposalResponse17
data.value: Go ahead: state your offer. And hurry up - I can't spend all day at this!

data.name: proposalResponse18
data.value: Well, let's hear your brilliant idea.

data.name: proposalResponse19
data.value: Well, go ahead and put something on the table.

data.name: proposalResponse20
data.value: Well, state $CIVNAME1's offer - and be quick about it.

data.name: proposalResponse21
data.value: So, what is this great deal you are offering me?

data.name: proposalResponse22
data.value: All right, I listen. But mind that you don't try any of your swinging $CIVADJ2 merchants' tricks on me...

data.name: proposalResponse23
data.value: Hmmm. The $CIVADJ2 merchants are known the world over as crafty bargainers, but I'll listen to your offer.

data.name: whatever1
data.value: Is there anything more?

data.name: whatever2
data.value: You were saying?

data.name: whatever3
data.value: Take your time...

data.name: whatever4
data.value: I beg your pardon?

data.name: whatever5
data.value: What?

data.name: whatever6
data.value: I don't understand.

data.name: whatever7
data.value: Please continue.

data.name: whatever8
data.value: Do you want to discuss anything else?

data.name: whatever9
data.value: Go on...

data.name: whatever10
data.value: Please go on.

data.name: whatever11
data.value: Go ahead.

data.name: whatever12
data.value: Is that all?

data.name: whatever13
data.value: Sorry?

data.name: whatever14
data.value: Moving right along...

data.name: whatever15
data.value: I haven't got all day, you know.

data.name: whatever16
data.value: I'm a busy ruler. Please get on with it.

data.name: whatever17
data.value: I haven't got all day...

data.name: whatever18
data.value: Umm, right...

data.name: whatever19
data.value: Huh?

data.name: whatever20
data.value: Yeah, sure, whatever...

data.name: whatever21
data.value: Change your mind?

data.name: whatever22
data.value: Pardon me?

data.name: whatever23
data.value: Could you please hurry this up?

data.name: whatever24
data.value: Something on your mind?

data.name: whatever25
data.value: What are you talking about?

data.name: whatever26
data.value: What was that all about?

data.name: whatever27
data.value: Get on with it, please.

data.name: whatever28
data.value: Are you deliberately testing my patience?

data.name: whatever29
data.value: Please don't waste my time.

data.name: whatever30
data.value: Quit stalling!

data.name: whatever31
data.value: Stop that!

data.name: whatever32
data.value: What are you doing?

data.name: whatever33
data.value: Could you hurry this up?

data.name: whatever34
data.value: Why are you wasting my time like this?

data.name: whatever35
data.value: I grow tired of your games.

data.name: whatever36
data.value: Don't waffle on the issue.

data.name: whatever37
data.value: What are you trying to tell me?

data.name: whatever38
data.value: Don't toy with me.

data.name: whatever39
data.value: I don't have time for this.

data.name: whatever40
data.value: Three words: increase your medication...

data.name: whatever41
data.value: Stop fooling around.

data.name: whatever42
data.value: Hurry up, will you?

data.name: peaceGreeting1
data.value: Ah, $PLAYER0. Your friends the $CIVADJ5 people greet you! We are always happy to trade with you.

data.name: peaceGreeting2
data.value: Mighty $CIVNAME4 salutes you! Will you deal with us and strengthen our friendship?

data.name: peaceGreeting3
data.value: We greet you, friend, but have little time! What do you want?

data.name: peaceGreeting4
data.value: The $CIVADJ5 people greet you. Shall we trade together? Both of our countries will benefit...

data.name: peaceGreeting5
data.value: Ancient $CIVNAME4 greets $CIVNAME1! Would you care to trade with us?

data.name: peaceGreeting6
data.value: $AI3 greets you, friend $PLAYER0! What can I do for you?

data.name: peaceGreeting7
data.value: The Mighty $CIVADJ5 people greet you! What do you want from us?

data.name: peaceGreeting8
data.value: $CIVNAME4 greets the $CIVADJ2 people. Will you strengthen your nation by trading with us?

data.name: peaceGreeting9
data.value: Ah, $PLAYER0. What can $CIVNAME4 do for you?

data.name: peaceGreeting10
data.value: We acknowledge our friend, $PLAYER0. Do you wish to trade with wealthy $CIVNAME4?

data.name: peaceGreeting11
data.value: Greetings, $PLAYER0, Ruler of barbarian $CIVNAME1. What is it that you desire of $CIVNAME4?

data.name: peaceGreeting12
data.value: The people of $CIVNAME4 greet you! Why have you come here?

data.name: peaceGreeting13
data.value: $AI3 salutes you. Do you wish to trade with the industrious $CIVADJ5 people?

data.name: peaceGreeting14
data.value: Industrious and Rich $CIVNAME4 greets the $CIVADJ2 people. Let us strengthen your backward civilization by making a trade.

data.name: peaceGreeting15
data.value: Greetings, $PLAYER0. I'm rather busy now ensuring the world dominance of $CIVNAME4; please make your visit brief.

data.name: peaceGreeting16
data.value: Mother $CIVNAME4 welcomes you, $PLAYER0. Are you here only to admire my great beauty, or is there some other purpose to your visit?

data.name: peaceGreeting17
data.value: $AI3 of $CIVNAME4 greets you! Will you trade with us and make both of our countries wealthy and strong?

data.name: peaceGreeting18
data.value: The sturdy people of $CIVNAME4 welcome you! To what do we owe the honor of your visit?

data.name: peaceGreeting19
data.value: $PLAYER0, trade is the life-blood of the world. Does your backward civilization wish to trade with mighty $CIVNAME4?

data.name: peaceGreeting20
data.value: $CIVNAME4 greets you! Will you trade with us and strengthen our friendship?

data.name: peaceGreeting21
data.value: $AI3 greets the wise and generous $PLAYER0. Let us speak of many things.

data.name: peaceGreeting22
data.value: The business of $CIVNAME4 is business, $PLAYER0. Let's do business together and make everybody rich.

data.name: peaceGreeting23
data.value: $CIVNAME4 greets the mighty $CIVADJ2 people. What can we do for you?

data.name: peaceGreeting24
data.value: The $CIVADJ5 people welcome you, $PLAYER0. Sit down and set a while. How are things going in $CIVNAME1?

data.name: peaceGreeting25
data.value: $CIVNAME4 welcomes you! What can our poor and humble civilization do for mighty $CIVNAME1?

data.name: peaceGreeting26
data.value: Unworthy $CIVNAME4 greets you, $PLAYER0. Why are you here?

data.name: peaceGreeting27
data.value: The people of $CIVNAME4 greet you! Shall we trade together and bring joy and happiness to our people?

data.name: peaceGreeting28
data.value: The Glorious $CIVADJ5 people salute you, $PLAYER0! Why do you grace us with your presence?

data.name: peaceGreeting29
data.value: Holy $CIVNAME4 welcomes you! Shall we trade together?

data.name: peaceGreeting30
data.value: The people of Mighty $CIVNAME4 greet you! Would you like to make a deal?

data.name: peaceGreeting31
data.value: The $CIVADJ5 people greet you, $PLAYER0! Shall we trade together in peace and friendship?

data.name: peaceGreeting32
data.value: $CIVNAME4 greets you! Will you deal with us and strengthen our friendship?

data.name: peaceGreeting33
data.value: The peaceful people of $CIVNAME4 welcome you, $PLAYER0. Would you like a nice vegetarian curry?

data.name: peaceGreeting34
data.value: Great $CIVNAME4, envy of the world, welcomes $PLAYER0, Ruler of the barbarian people of $CIVNAME1.

data.name: peaceGreeting35
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0. What can Mighty $CIVNAME4 do for your backward civilization?

data.name: peaceGreeting36
data.value: $CIVNAME4 greets you! Shall we trade together so that both of our civilizations flourish and thrive?

data.name: peaceGreeting37
data.value: The $CIVADJ6 salute you! Shall we trade together, or would you prefer to go to war and do battle until one of us is wiped off the face of the planet?

data.name: peaceGreeting38
data.value: The Warlike $CIVADJ6 greet you! Why are you here?

data.name: peaceGreeting39
data.value: The God-King $AI3 welcomes you! Would you trade with us?

data.name: peaceGreeting40
data.value: Ah, $PLAYER0. Why do you visit $AI3, Ruler of the Mighty $CIVADJ5 people?

data.name: peaceGreeting41
data.value: Trade with us, $PLAYER0, so that we can grow rich and powerful!

data.name: peaceGreeting42
data.value: The $CIVADJ5 warrior people welcome the Ruler of mighty $CIVNAME1.

data.name: peaceGreeting43
data.value: The peaceful $CIVADJ5 people greet you! Let us trade together.

data.name: peaceGreeting44
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0. Let us smoke the pipe of peace and friendship and discuss trading opportunities between our people.

data.name: peaceGreeting45
data.value: $AI3, of the Mighty $CIVADJ6, greets you. Why are you here?

data.name: peaceGreeting46
data.value: Hail, $PLAYER0; $CIVNAME4 greets you! Let us do business together.

data.name: peaceGreeting47
data.value: $CIVNAME4 welcomes you! Trade will strengthen both of our people; will you deal with us?

data.name: peaceGreeting48
data.value: $PLAYER0: I am late for my milk bath, so kindly be brief. Why are you here?

data.name: allianceGreeting1
data.value: The $CIVADJ9 greet you, and acknowledge your friendship and support during our war with $CIVNAME3. What do you want?

data.name: allianceGreeting2
data.value: The $CIVADJ8 people greet you! With your help we will crush our mutual foe, $CIVNAME3, destroy their cities and sow their fields with salt! What can we do for you?

data.name: allianceGreeting3
data.value: Be quick: our war against $CIVNAME3 continues and we have much to do. What do you want?

data.name: allianceGreeting4
data.value: Wise and beautiful $AI6 greets you! Our war with $CIVNAME3 continues.

data.name: allianceGreeting5
data.value: Ancient and powerful $CIVNAME7 welcomes you, $PLAYER0! We appreciate your help in our war against $CIVNAME3. How can I help you?

data.name: allianceGreeting6
data.value: Ah, $PLAYER0, wise and just Ruler of $CIVNAME1! I trust the war against our enemy, $CIVNAME3, goes well?

data.name: allianceGreeting7
data.value: The $CIVADJ8 people greet you, $PLAYER0! We appreciate what small help your tiny civilization can give in our war against $CIVNAME3.

data.name: allianceGreeting8
data.value: Mighty $AI6, all-powerful Ruler of $CIVNAME7, salutes you and acknowledges your assistance in the war against $CIVNAME3.

data.name: allianceGreeting9
data.value: $CIVNAME7 welcomes you, $PLAYER0! We appreciate your help in the war against our common enemy, $CIVNAME3. What do you want?

data.name: allianceGreeting10
data.value: $CIVNAME7 welcomes you, $PLAYER0, brave leader of the $CIVADJ2 people! We gratefully acknowledge your help in our war against $CIVNAME3.

data.name: allianceGreeting11
data.value: On behalf of mighty $CIVNAME7, I, $AI6, thank you for your alliance in the war against $CIVNAME3. How can I assist you?

data.name: allianceGreeting12
data.value: $AI6 salutes you, $PLAYER0! How can $CIVNAME7 assist you in prosecuting the war against our common foe, $CIVNAME3?

data.name: allianceGreeting13
data.value: The Mighty $CIVADJ8 people greet you! While we certainly could win the war on our own, we appreciate your help in the war against $CIVNAME3.

data.name: allianceGreeting14
data.value: The Fierce and Valorous $CIVADJ8 people extend their hand to our ally, $CIVNAME1! How can we help you in the war to destroy our mutual foe, $CIVNAME3?

data.name: allianceGreeting15
data.value: Ah, $PLAYER0! Together we will crush the $CIVADJ4 swine! How can $CIVNAME7 assist you?

data.name: allianceGreeting16
data.value: Mother $CIVNAME7 greets Brave and Valorous $PLAYER0, Ruler of the $CIVNOUN5! We appreciate your help in our war against $CIVNAME3.

data.name: allianceGreeting17
data.value: $AI6 affectionately greets you, $PLAYER0! How can we assist you in the ongoing war against $CIVNAME3?

data.name: allianceGreeting18
data.value: Welcome, Mighty $PLAYER0! There is still much to be done if we are to win our war against $CIVNAME3.

data.name: allianceGreeting19
data.value: Ancient $CIVNAME7 greets you. Like wheat from a sickle, the $CIVADJ4 people will fall before our blades!

data.name: allianceGreeting20
data.value: I, $AI6, respectfully greet our brave ally, $PLAYER0, and hope your nation prospers in the war against $CIVNAME3.

data.name: allianceGreeting21
data.value: The $CIVADJ8 people greet you! Like a mighty storm we will rain destruction on our foe, $CIVNAME3.

data.name: allianceGreeting22
data.value: Greetings from $CIVNAME7, $PLAYER0! I surely hate war, but sometimes it is necessary. How goes the fight against our common foe, $CIVNAME3?

data.name: allianceGreeting23
data.value: How do, $PLAYER0? Could you make it quick? I'm kind of busy running the war against our enemy, $CIVNAME3.

data.name: allianceGreeting24
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0! We thank you for your help in our fight with $CIVNAME3. Now what can I do for you?

data.name: allianceGreeting25
data.value: $CIVNAME7 humbly greets you, and thanks you for your help in our struggle against the hated enemy, $CIVNAME3. How can our worthless civilization be of assistance to Mighty $CIVNAME1?

data.name: allianceGreeting26
data.value: I welcome you, $PLAYER0. We most humbly appreciate your help in the battle against $CIVNAME3.

data.name: allianceGreeting27
data.value: The $CIVADJ8 people greet you! We appreciate your help in our war against $CIVNAME3. Together we will conquer our foes and gather much treasure!

data.name: allianceGreeting28
data.value: $CIVNAME7 salutes you! How can we be of assistance to $CIVNAME1 in our holy war against $CIVNAME3?

data.name: allianceGreeting29
data.value: Ah, $CIVNAME7's Noble ally! I am on my way to the front lines, to personally prosecute the war against $CIVNAME3. With the help of the Almighty, we surely cannot fail!

data.name: allianceGreeting30
data.value: $CIVNAME7 welcomes our Valiant ally, $PLAYER0! The war against $CIVNAME3 continues unabated. How can $CIVNAME7 be of assistance to Mighty $CIVNAME1?

data.name: allianceGreeting31
data.value: Greetings from the $CIVADJ8 people. We appreciate your aid in the war against $CIVNAME3.

data.name: allianceGreeting32
data.value: $CIVNAME7 salutes our ally, $PLAYER0! I humbly thank you for your help in the battle against $CIVNAME3. How can we help you?

data.name: allianceGreeting33
data.value: Ah, $PLAYER0. It is good to see you. The war against our common foe, $CIVNAME3, goes well, I trust? What can I do for you?

data.name: allianceGreeting34
data.value: Mighty $CIVNAME7 acknowledges your assistance in the struggle against $CIVNAME3, oh puissant $PLAYER0! What do you want?

data.name: allianceGreeting35
data.value: I, Godlike $AI6, note your arrival, oh $PLAYER0! Tell me, my ally: how goes the war against hated $CIVNAME3?

data.name: allianceGreeting36
data.value: $AI6 greets you, $PLAYER0, and thanks you for your aid in the war against the minions of $CIVNAME3. But why are you here? Should you not be on the field of battle?

data.name: allianceGreeting37
data.value: The $CIVADJ8 people greet you! Together we will capture many $CIVADJ4 warriors and sacrifice them to our gods! Won't that be fun?

data.name: allianceGreeting38
data.value: $AI6 embraces our friend and ally, $PLAYER0! Together we will make the fields run red with the blood of $CIVNAME3.

data.name: allianceGreeting39
data.value: I, $AI6, Ruler of the $CIVADJ9, welcome my ally, $PLAYER0, Ruler of the inferior but still quite doughty $CIVADJ2 warriors. Let us destroy $CIVNAME3 without delay!

data.name: allianceGreeting40
data.value: $AI6 of the $CIVADJ9 welcomes you. Let us take to the field together and crush our common foe, $CIVNAME3.

data.name: allianceGreeting41
data.value: Ah, $PLAYER0! $CIVNAME3 still pollutes the world with its foul existence. We must destroy them, and soon!

data.name: allianceGreeting42
data.value: The $CIVADJ8 people welcome their friend and ally, $CIVNAME1. How can we help you in the war against our common enemy, $CIVNAME3?

data.name: allianceGreeting43
data.value: The $CIVADJ8 people greet you, brave $PLAYER0! We thank you for your help in the war against $CIVNAME3. How can we help you?

data.name: allianceGreeting44
data.value: The heavens smile upon our war against fearsome $CIVNAME3, oh mighty $PLAYER0! Let us smoke the pipe of peace and discuss our future battles.

data.name: allianceGreeting45
data.value: $CIVNAME3 grows more insolent each day, mighty ally $PLAYER0! But together we shall teach them proper humility and respect for true warriors!

data.name: allianceGreeting46
data.value: Greetings, $PLAYER0. I hope you prosper in the war against that tiresome villain, $CIVNAME3? How can $CIVNAME7 be of service?

data.name: allianceGreeting47
data.value: Hail, $PLAYER0! We welcome your continuing assistance in the war with $CIVNAME3.

data.name: allianceGreeting48
data.value: The $CIVADJ8 people greet you and acknowledge your help in the war against $CIVNAME3. Can we be of any help?

data.name: warGreeting1
data.value: Greetings, $PLAYER0. $CIVNAME5 is mighty, but she prefers peace to war. Let us end this bloody struggle.

data.name: warGreeting2
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0. Come, let us end this pointless conflict.

data.name: warGreeting3
data.value: $PLAYER0, what do you want to discuss with me?

data.name: warGreeting4
data.value: $CIVNAME1's doom is assured, $PLAYER0, but it amuses me to listen to your pleas for mercy. You may begin.

data.name: warGreeting5
data.value: Why are you here, $PLAYER0? Our people are at war.

data.name: warGreeting6
data.value: The $CIVADJ2 people are the sworn enemies of $CIVNAME5. Why do you seek audience with me?

data.name: warGreeting7
data.value: $CIVNAME5 greets you, our sworn enemy!

data.name: warGreeting8
data.value: $CIVNAME1's doom is assured, $PLAYER0, but it amuses me to listen to your pleas for mercy. You may begin.

data.name: warGreeting9
data.value: We acknowledge your request to meet. Now be quick, we have $CIVNOUN3 to kill!

data.name: warGreeting10
data.value: Ancient and wise $CIVNAME5 grants you an audience, $PLAYER0. Do you seek peace, or do you wish this foolish war to continue?

data.name: warGreeting11
data.value: You are ruthless and bloody, $PLAYER0. What do you want with me?

data.name: warGreeting12
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0. Come, let us sit together and end this bloody war.

data.name: warGreeting13
data.value: $CIVNAME5 does not usually converse with enemies. Be quick!

data.name: warGreeting14
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0. Come, let us sit together and end this bloody war.

data.name: warGreeting15
data.value: $CIVNAME5 does not fear war, $PLAYER0, but we prefer peace. Make a reasonable proposal and we can end this conflict now.

data.name: warGreeting16
data.value: Are you here to surrender? If not, I do not see what we have to speak about.

data.name: warGreeting17
data.value: $CIVNAME5 does not usually converse with enemies. Be quick!

data.name: warGreeting18
data.value: $CIVNAME5 is mighty, $PLAYER0. Have you finally recognized the futility of resistance?

data.name: warGreeting19
data.value: Mighty $AI4, greatest warrior of the age, grants you an audience, $PLAYER0. What do you want to discuss?

data.name: warGreeting20
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0. The longer this war continues, the more $CIVADJ2 citizens will die. Make me a reasonable offer and let us end this now.

data.name: warGreeting21
data.value: Why are you here, my foe?

data.name: warGreeting22
data.value: You are beaten, $PLAYER0, admit it. Give us what we want and end the destruction of your people.

data.name: warGreeting23
data.value: Mighty $AI4, Ruler of the warlike $CIVADJ6 people, greets his enemy, $PLAYER0.

data.name: warGreeting24
data.value: Why are you here, my foe?

data.name: warGreeting25
data.value: Greetings, my enemy $PLAYER0! Why are you here? Too cowardly to meet me on the field of battle?

data.name: warGreeting26
data.value: You are beaten, $PLAYER0, admit it. Give us what we want and save your people from annihilation.

data.name: warGreeting27
data.value: The war goes badly for you, $PLAYER0. Admit defeat and give us what we want.

data.name: warGreeting28
data.value: $AI4 agrees to give audience to his foe, $PLAYER0. What do you want?

data.name: warGreeting29
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0. Let us discuss an honorable end to this bloody conflict.

data.name: warGreeting30
data.value: $CIVNAME5 remains a dangerous enemy, $PLAYER0. You would be wise not to underestimate us. Why are you here?

data.name: warGreeting31
data.value: $CIVNAME5 is a dangerous enemy, $PLAYER0. You would be wise not to underestimate us. Why are you here?

data.name: warGreeting32
data.value: Greetings. This war is liable to bankrupt both of our nations. Let us craft a sensible peace treaty and end the fighting.

data.name: warGreeting33
data.value: Greetings, $PLAYER0. Know that mighty $CIVNAME5 will continue this struggle until we emerge victorious!

data.name: warGreeting34
data.value: Mighty $CIVNAME5 greets its foe, foolish $PLAYER0!

data.name: warGreeting35
data.value: What do you want, $PLAYER0? It is unseemly for sworn enemies to meet like this.

data.name: warGreeting36
data.value: Mere words are unlikely to avert your doom, $PLAYER0!

data.name: warGreeting37
data.value: I do not wish to speak with you, $PLAYER0. Say what you have to say and then be gone!

data.name: warGreeting38
data.value: Well? $CIVNAME5 may be down, but she will return, and stronger than ever! Say what you have to say and be gone.

data.name: warGreeting39
data.value: Peace with honor. That's all that $CIVNAME5 is looking for. Will you make an offer?

data.name: warGreeting40
data.value: Mighty $CIVNAME5 greets the Ruler of its worthy foe, $CIVNAME1.

data.name: warGreeting41
data.value: Well? Must I remind you that we are at war? Do not waste my time unless you have something important to say.

data.name: warGreeting42
data.value: Yes? I want to hear nothing from you except your abject surrender.

data.name: warGreeting43
data.value: Yes? I want to hear nothing from you except your abject surrender.

data.name: warGreeting44
data.value: You wish to speak with me, $CIVADJ2 swine! Pah! Be quick!

data.name: warGreeting45
data.value: Has $CIVNAME1 come here to beg for mercy?

data.name: warGreeting46
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0. Why have you come? Do you wish to find a way to end this war?

data.name: warGreeting47
data.value: Beautiful $AI4 of $CIVNAME5 greets you, valiant and merciful $PLAYER0. Can we together find a way out of this bloody conflict?

data.name: warGreeting48
data.value: $CIVNAME5 greets you, Ruler of bloodthirsty $CIVNAME1.

data.name: warGreeting49
data.value: Why do you wish to speak with me, $PLAYER0? Our people are at war. And you are losing, I'm told.

data.name: warGreeting50
data.value: Ah, $PLAYER0 - we are at war, aren't we? Shouldn't you be off somewhere doing something military?

data.name: warGreeting51
data.value: $CIVNAME5 greets you, Ruler of foolish $CIVNAME1.

data.name: warGreeting52
data.value: Why do you wish to speak with me, $PLAYER0? Our people are at war. And you are losing, I'm told.

data.name: warGreeting53
data.value: $CIVNAME5 greets you, Ruler of doomed $CIVNAME1.

data.name: warGreeting54
data.value: What do you want? Make your plea for mercy and then go away.

data.name: warGreeting55
data.value: Greetings, wise $PLAYER0! War destroys; it does not create. Let us settle this unfortunate conflict now.

data.name: warGreeting56
data.value: Greetings. While you may have us at a temporary disadvantage, we are far from defeated. Let us reason together.

data.name: warGreeting57
data.value: $CIVNAME5 greets you. Are you here to talk terms of peace?

data.name: warGreeting58
data.value: $CIVNAME5 greets you. Are you here to talk terms of peace?

data.name: warGreeting59
data.value: Greetings, $PLAYER0. Our mighty armies drive your pathetic forces before them, like old women sweeping bugs from the kitchen. Why are you here?

data.name: warGreeting60
data.value: Despair, foolish $PLAYER0! $CIVNAME5's warriors will crush you!

data.name: warGreeting61
data.value: Be quick, $PLAYER0. I am off to lead my numberless armies against your doomed civilization.

data.name: warGreeting62
data.value: $CIVNAME5 greets you, evil $PLAYER0. Soon my armies will fall upon your helpless cities, like a ton of bricks descending upon a surprised duck.

data.name: warGreeting63
data.value: $CIVNAME5 greets you. Are you here to talk terms of peace?

data.name: warGreeting64
data.value: Good day, $PLAYER0. Do you wish to talk peace terms? I would be happy to find an honorable way to end this bloody struggle.

data.name: warGreeting65
data.value: War is hell, $PLAYER0. Come on: let's talk our way into heaven!

data.name: warGreeting66
data.value: Greetings, $PLAYER0. Let's stop pounding each other like two bulls in a water closet.

data.name: warGreeting67
data.value: Good day, $PLAYER0. Do you wish to talk peace terms? I would be happy to find an honorable way to end this bloody struggle.

data.name: warGreeting68
data.value: Hello, $PLAYER0. Like my old daddy used to say, 'Fighting never made anybody rich except the morticians.' Let's sit down and thrash this thing out.

data.name: warGreeting69
data.value: You're tangling with the wrong people, $PLAYER0, and you're going to regret it.

data.name: warGreeting70
data.value: Good day, $PLAYER0. Do you wish to talk peace terms? I would be happy to find an honorable way to end this bloody struggle.

data.name: warGreeting71
data.value: $CIVNAME5 greets you. The only peace terms we will accept are unconditional surrender.

data.name: warGreeting72
data.value: You look like you were in a hatchet fight, and everybody had a hatchet except you.

data.name: warGreeting73
data.value: It's a beautiful day, $PLAYER0, far too beautiful to ruin with death and destruction. Can't we end this ugly war?

data.name: warGreeting74
data.value: The struggle continues, with no end in sight. Come: make an honorable offer, and let us have peace.

data.name: warGreeting75
data.value: $CIVNAME5 greets you, leader of our enemy, $CIVNAME1. Why do you seek audience with me?

data.name: warGreeting76
data.value: Ah, $PLAYER0. I was expecting you. Shall we discuss the terms of your surrender?

data.name: warGreeting77
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0. My valiant warriors triumph over your puny forces in every battle. Do you seek peace with Mighty $CIVNAME5?

data.name: warGreeting78
data.value: $CIVNAME5 greets you, leader of hated $CIVNAME1. Why do you seek audience with me?

data.name: warGreeting79
data.value: Yes? Be quick - I'm quite busy wiping your pathetic civilization off the face of the planet.

data.name: warGreeting80
data.value: Ah, $PLAYER0. I was expecting you. Shall we discuss the terms of your surrender?

data.name: warGreeting81
data.value: All your base are belong to us!

data.name: warGreeting82
data.value: I am glad that you have come, $PLAYER0. Come, let us work together to end this bloody conflict!

data.name: warGreeting83
data.value: $PLAYER0, welcome. Do you desire to end the war with $CIVNAME5?

data.name: warGreeting84
data.value: Greetings. We are at war: what do you have to say to me?

data.name: warGreeting85
data.value: I do not wish to speak with you, $PLAYER0. Say what you have to say and then be gone!

data.name: warGreeting86
data.value: $PLAYER0, have you yet learned the futility of your unjust war against $CIVNAME5?

data.name: warGreeting87
data.value: We are at war, $PLAYER0. What do you want?

data.name: warGreeting88
data.value: $CIVNAME5 greets you! You are beaten, but we can be merciful. Please state your terms for surrender.

data.name: warGreeting89
data.value: I, $AI4, leader of $CIVNAME5, welcome my enemy, $PLAYER0. Do you wish to discuss terms of peace?

data.name: warGreeting90
data.value: Our troops triumph on the field of battle, $PLAYER0. Will you surrender before you are stricken from the earth?

data.name: warGreeting91
data.value: $CIVNAME5 greets you. We are both reasonable people: can we not together come up with a way to end this bloody conflict?

data.name: warGreeting92
data.value: Greetings. Why do you seek an audience with me?

data.name: warGreeting93
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0. I grieve at the death and suffering of both our peoples. Do you offer reasonable terms upon which to end this war?

data.name: warGreeting94
data.value: $CIVNAME5 greets you. We are both reasonable people: can we not together come up with a way to end this bloody conflict?

data.name: warGreeting95
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0. I grieve at the death and suffering of both our peoples. Will you offer reasonable terms upon which to end this war?

data.name: warGreeting96
data.value: You are an untrustworthy leader, $PLAYER0, and you have caused $CIVNAME5 much grief. Why do you come before me?

data.name: warGreeting97
data.value: Peaceful $CIVNAME5 greets our foe, $PLAYER0, Ruler of $CIVNAME1. Do you wish to discuss the terms of your surrender?

data.name: warGreeting98
data.value: $CIVNAME5 greets you. We are both reasonable people: can we not together come up with a way to end this bloody conflict?

data.name: warGreeting99
data.value: Welcome, my enemy. What do you want of Victorious $CIVNAME5?

data.name: warGreeting100
data.value: Do not underestimate the power of $CIVNAME5, warlike $PLAYER0. We will continue to battle until we achieve a reasonable peace.

data.name: warGreeting101
data.value: Greetings, $PLAYER0. Do you come to discuss terms for a peace treaty?

data.name: warGreeting102
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0. Will you discuss terms for ending this conflict?

data.name: warGreeting103
data.value: You have great courage coming before me like this, $PLAYER0, while our people are at war. What do you want to discuss?

data.name: warGreeting104
data.value: I have little time for foolish chatter. May I remind you that we are at war?

data.name: warGreeting105
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0. Will you discuss terms for ending this conflict?

data.name: warGreeting106
data.value: You have great courage coming before me like this, $PLAYER0, while our people are at war. What do you want to discuss?

data.name: warGreeting107
data.value: So, have you come crawling to $CIVNAME5 to beg for mercy?

data.name: warGreeting108
data.value: You dare to come before me, $AI4? Speak quickly and well, for I have little patience with your honeyed words.

data.name: warGreeting109
data.value: Greetings, $PLAYER0. The gods tell me that this is a propitious time to make peace. Will you make us an offer?

data.name: warGreeting110
data.value: $PLAYER0, why do you seek an audience with the $CIVADJ7?

data.name: warGreeting111
data.value: Our gods demand an end to this foolish conflict, $PLAYER0. Let us work together.

data.name: warGreeting112
data.value: Greetings, $PLAYER0. The gods are well-satisfied with the number of your warriors I sacrifice on their altars! I trust that your gods are equally pleased with your sacrifice of my warriors?

data.name: warGreeting113
data.value: Ah, $PLAYER0, welcome! Our war hangs in the balance. Why do you come before me?

data.name: warGreeting114
data.value: I, godlike $AI4, greet my hated foe, $PLAYER0. Why are you here?

data.name: warGreeting115
data.value: The ever-victorious $CIVADJ7 greet you. Are you here to surrender?

data.name: warGreeting116
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0! We have sacrificed many of your warriors on our altars. Want to come watch?

data.name: warGreeting117
data.value: I, godlike $AI4, greet my hated foe, $PLAYER0. Why are you here?

data.name: warGreeting118
data.value: Mighty $AI4 of the warlike $CIVADJ7 greets you. Why are you here?

data.name: warGreeting119
data.value: Why have you come before me, $PLAYER0? Do you seek an end to this pointless war?

data.name: warGreeting120
data.value: Welcome, mighty $PLAYER0. Come, let us reason together and find an end to this sorrowful war.

data.name: warGreeting121
data.value: Mighty $AI4 of the warlike $CIVADJ7 greets you. Why are you here?

data.name: warGreeting122
data.value: Welcome, evil $PLAYER0! Know you that the mighty $CIVADJ7 will defend their people and their honor to the end!

data.name: warGreeting123
data.value: Greetings, $PLAYER0. Do you offer an honorable end to this bloody struggle?

data.name: warGreeting124
data.value: Mighty $AI4 of the warlike $CIVADJ7 greets you. Why are you here?

data.name: warGreeting125
data.value: The $CIVADJ7 are at war with your pathetic civilization. What could we possibly have to speak about?

data.name: warGreeting126
data.value: We will crush your evil, smelly civilization! But I am willing to entertain your pathetic pleas for mercy. Speak on.

data.name: warGreeting127
data.value: Greetings, $PLAYER0, leader of the warlike $CIVNAME1 people. Shall we reason together and bring to an end this bloody war?

data.name: warGreeting128
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0. This war stains the land with horror. Can we not end it with honor?

data.name: warGreeting129
data.value: You are an honorable foe, $PLAYER0. Do you wish to discuss terms of peace?

data.name: warGreeting130
data.value: You are an honorable foe, $PLAYER0. Do you wish to discuss terms of peace?

data.name: warGreeting131
data.value: The $CIVADJ6 people welcome their sworn enemy $PLAYER0, Ruler of the treacherous $CIVADJ2 people. Why do you come before us?

data.name: warGreeting132
data.value: I do not wish to speak with you, $PLAYER0. Say what you have to say and then be gone!

data.name: warGreeting133
data.value: You are an honorable foe, $PLAYER0. Do you wish to discuss terms of peace?

data.name: warGreeting134
data.value: The $CIVADJ7 greet you. Do you wish to surrender now?

data.name: warGreeting135
data.value: Surrender now, $PLAYER0, before we wipe your miserable people from the face of the planet!

data.name: warGreeting136
data.value: Welcome, $PLAYER0. Do you wish to discuss terms of peace?

data.name: warGreeting137
data.value: We are honored that you have chosen to grace us with your presence, $PLAYER0. Shall we discuss how to bring an end to this tiresome war?

data.name: warGreeting138
data.value: May I remind you that we are at war, $PLAYER0? Why have you come before us?

data.name: warGreeting139
data.value: Greetings, $PLAYER0. Shall we discuss the terms of your surrender?

data.name: warGreeting140
data.value: I, $AI4, Most Beloved Ruler of the etcetera, etcetera, grant your tiresome request for an audience. Well?

data.name: warGreeting141
data.value: You wish to speak to me? Well, go ahead.

data.name: warGreeting142
data.value: I, $AI4, Most Beloved Ruler of the etcetera, etcetera, grant your tiresome request for an audience. Well?

data.name: warGreeting143
data.value: You are a horrible person, $PLAYER0, and we are at war. Why have you come here?

data.name: warGreeting144
data.value: $CIVNAME5 will crush you, you know. Don't you think you should surrender before your people lose everything?
